ModMetaData.name: LMC038s.圣白狐
ModMetaData.author: [KOR]Bichang
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html 前言：咳咳，这次的简介貌似又得我自己来写（编）了。 汉化：jxb12306 合集地址：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html 添加了圣白狐作为可以饲养的动物，与九莲-九尾狐为同一作者的作品。出现概率极低并且只会出现在寒带和温带，热带看来是不会有了。实在想要的：1.开发者模式，2.重开档自己加剧本条件。具体参数见原文或者MOD站截图。 兼容的附加MOD：狗曰，Animal Gear，Combat Extended，HardCore SK (not 1.0 ver) I personally drew a picture and added it. – Stat Value : 1750 Size : 0.9 HealthScale : 2.5 Wildness : 75% Temperature : -70 ~ 30 MoveSpeed : 7.14 ExpectancyAge : 60 (0 ~Puppy~ 2.5 ~Juvenile~ 7.5 ~Adult) Wool : 25day, x50 wool FoodType : Omnivore – Appearance position Very low probability, one appears in cold climates or in temperate climate. — Compatible Modes — – A Dog Said.. – Animal Gear – Combat Extended – HardCore SK (not 1.0 ver)
